attributes.additional_details:
State owned-&-operated digital-archive addresses technology-upgrade [BetaMax, Super 8, photographs] affording current-&-future generations trace & view ancestors at work, play & study.

User-funded & protected-by fingerprints 'priceless' archive for-the-most-part of-interest-to extended-families.

Promoting broadband-access clearly CRITICAL to UK-Economy.

Nice-to watch ancestors making-things, driving-buses...
